column4: Hi All, How is the weekend? I am trying to install flashplugin-nonfree but its stuck at "Setting up flashplugin-nonfree (7.0.63.3ubuntu3)".... any clues? thanks
i was just there.  it took about 30 min, but it worked
but i don't know what to do if it isn't working
30 minutes?? wow... ok i will wait
but I don't know what to say if it doesn't work, and maybe it doesn't need more time.  maybe its frozen, but it took a long time for me
thanks nachoWide
can anyone explain how to use a program after using the package installer?  how do i get it to run?
which program did you install?
keepassx
if its a GNOME program it might be in the menus. Otherwise you can add it to the menus
not in the menu
can you run it via the terminal?
just enter the name of the program on the command prompt
typing 'keepassx' doesn't work
wat does the program do? is there a website for that software? i am not familiar with the program itself
password storage.  http://keepass.sourceforge.net/
does this help? http://keepassx.sourceforge.net/en/howto.html
[Ex0r] : exit
sure, but I just don't understand where the program is supposed to be located
I believe if its on the PATH it should be visible by typing: which keepassx
[Ex0r] : try Ctrl + Alt + F7
sorry, i'm new to the whole installing process.  i used the DEB release, which is all graphical.  it shows all the directories where the files were unpacked, but i don't see how to run the thing
